channel.title: Making a client, just read it
channel.description:
Hey Guys, How do i make a client that other people can download and not be able to change their client stuff. .java file. please help me.
P.S Like when you download a server, that client you download, how to i make one like that to connect to my no-ip , IP adress.

item.title: Making a client, just read it
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

You modify the Java source code (.java files) and then you compile them withing your command prompt using JDK (the javac executable) into bytecode (.class files), you give them the bytecode files to run using the JVM (the java executable) or you can package the bytecode classes into a JAR which is a container to directly run a set of classes without a command prompt. Visit http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/ for help on some of the terms and methods.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a client, just read it
